TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 887
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to William Kincheloe, 08-xx-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 887

div1.p: Mr. William Kincheloe To Stephen F. Austin Dr.

To Amt fees due by you on the title issued to you for two Leagues of Land each $165$ is $330 Money equal according to the estimate of Land office Money to 495.$ payable in Cattle American horses or Mules_______________________________________________________$495.
To this Amt paid for Stamp paper for your title___________ $3. 50
